# VEHICLE::SET_HELI_RESIST_TO_EXPLOSION

## Summary
(MP Only) Heli might survive from 2 or more explosions when set

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** vehicle
* **BOOL** resistToExplosion
